mil3.3.14:1.1: “Venerable Nāgasena, what is the distinguishing characteristic of examination?”
mil3.3.14:1.2: “Continuity, your majesty, is the distinguishing characteristic of examination.”
mil3.3.14:2.2: “Just as, your majesty, a bronze bowl which has been struck resounds afterwards, and lingers on, applied thought is to be seen as striking,
mil3.3.14:2.3: examination is to be seen as resounding.”
mil3.3.14:4.1: Distinguishing Characteristic of Examination Question fourteenth
